# ORG-WIDE / CERT PIVOTS

cert.subject="[target.com](http://target.com/)"  cert.subject="*.target.com"
cert.subject="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && protocol="https" && port="443"
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)"  cert.subject="[target.com](http://target.com/)"  header="[target.com](http://target.com/)"  # broad net

# DEV/STAGE/QA SURFACING (common env keywords)

domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && (host="dev.*"  host="stg.*"  host="qa.*"  host="test.*")

# DIRECTORY LISTING / BACKUPS

domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && title="Index of /" && body="Parent Directory"
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && (title="Index of /backup"  title="Index of /backups"  title="Index of /old")
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && (title="Index of /.git"  body=".git/HEAD")
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && (title="Index of /.svn"  body="/.svn/entries")

# SECRETS/SPILLS IN TEXT/JS

domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && header="Content-Type: application/javascript" && body="apiKey"
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && (body="AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID"  body="AKIA")
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && body="APP_KEY="           # Laravel .env spill
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && body="PRIVATE KEY-----"       # PEM leaks
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && body="eyJhbGciOi"          # JWT in responses
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && body="//# sourceMappingURL="    # JS source maps

# AUTH/SSO/OAUTH PIVOTS

domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && (body="/oauth/authorize"  body="OpenID Connect"  body="/.well-known/openid-configuration")

# CORS MISCONFIG (weak but good lead list)

domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && header="Access-Control-Allow-Origin: *" && header="Access-Control-Allow-Credentials: true"

# GRAPHQL / SWAGGER / API EXPLORERS

domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && (title="GraphQL Playground"  title="GraphiQL"  body="graphql?query=")
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && (title="Swagger UI"  body="swagger-ui"  body="openapi")

# DEBUG / STACK TRACE FINGERPRINTS

domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && (title="Whitelabel Error Page"  body="There was an unexpected error (type=)")
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && body="Traceback (most recent call last)"
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && (body="PHP Notice:"  body="PHP Warning:"  body="phpinfo()")

# CLOUD/EDGE FINGERPRINTS (useful for SSRF/CDN bypass trails)

domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && header="X-Amzn-Trace-Id"
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && header="X-Envoy-Upstream-Service-Time"
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && header="Server: nginx" && header="Via: varnish"

# ELASTIC / LOGGING / METRICS / CI

domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && (title="Kibana" || header="kbn-name")
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && title="Grafana" && body="Sign in"
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && title="Prometheus Time Series Collection and Processing Server"
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && title="Jenkins" && body="Login"
domain="[target.com](http://target.com/)" && title="SonarQube"
